description: Try our easy to follow Steak With Candied Onion And Brand Gravy recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Steak With Candied Onion And Brand Gravy Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.2kg beef ribeye with long bone (tomahawk steak)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C. Rub the steak with celery salt and black pepper, then drizzle with half the olive oil. Arrange on a wire rack over a roasting pan and bake for 15 minutes. Turn over and bake for a further 10 minutes, until medium (62°C internal temperature when tested with a probe thermometer). Set aside to rest.

Meanwhile, sauté the eschalots, garlic, bay leaves and cardamom seeds in the remaining olive oil, in a saucepan over a moderate heat for 15 minutes, until well-softened. Add the sugar, cook briefly, then pour in the brandy and boil until reduced by half. Add the stock, cream and vinegar, then boil until reduced to 2 cups.
Mix the flour and butter then whisk into the simmering sauce. Season with salt and pepper. Carve the tomahawk at the table, and serve with roasted vegetables and the gravy.
